Attributes and Properties #

Property Attribute Type Default Description
autofocus autofocus boolean false When this control is rendered, focus it automatically
checked checked boolean false Represents when the input is checked
disabled disabled boolean false Uses the disabled style
emphasized emphasized boolean false
invalid invalid boolean false Uses the invalid style
undefined label-below Moves the label below the radio button
readonly readonly boolean false
value value string '' Identifies this radio button within its radio group

Slots #

Name Description
default slot text label of the Radio button

Events #

Name Description
change
keydown Trick :focus-visible polyfill into thinking keyboard based focus
sp-radio:change When the input is interacted with and its state is changed
